ability.name: Unlikely Helmet
ability.description: * You cannot play a card on Unlikely Helmet except through the effect of another card (Kitchen Sink). * While there is a card on Unlikely Helmet, add 2 (Fast: 3, Slow: 1) to Shield generated by abilities. * At the end of combat, discard the card on Unlikely Helmet.
ability.flavor: A pail, a pot, a bucket, a colander, a sieve, a strainer, a helmet.
